Comments_List: I learned about the basic theories and applications of stochastic processes.
Different stochastic process, their properties, and the applications.

1. Wide range of topics and their applications in Stochastic process.
2. The way to prove classical theorems and solve new problems
Markov chains, martingales, Brownian motion, and diffusion processes.
The courses are well prepared. There were scripts for each class, which is very useful for learning.
We covered a wide range of topics, from basic limit theorems in Markov chains, to how it can be applied for Metropolis Hasting algorithms and generalized to Markov random fields.
Yes if he/she wants to learn the basic theories and applications of stochastic process.
Yes, it is a good class for students who are interested in stochastic process.

Yes, good intro to stochastic processes.
